traits: Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance against poison damage.
Dwarven Toughness: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Elf Weapon Training: Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
